scripts.scss: npm run scss:clean && node-sass ../Content/Sass/styles.scss -o ../Content/Styles --source-map true --output-style expanded --source-comments true
scripts.scss:watch: npm run scss && node-sass ../Content/Sass/styles.scss -o ../Content/Styles --source-map true --output-style expanded --source-comments true --watch -r ../Content/Styles
scripts.scss:prod: npm run scss:clean && node-sass ../Content/Sass/styles.scss -o ../Content/Styles --output-style compressed && npm run scss:final
